basics.name: Victor Alonso Ascencio
basics.label: ICT Test Engineer | Mechatronics Engineer | Software Development Technologist | 10 years of experience in automotive electronics manufacturing | Passionate about web development and continuous improvement
basics.summary: Mechatronics Engineer and Software Development Technologist with 10 years of experience in automotive electronics manufacturing. Passionate about web development and continuous improvement, I aim to contribute value to teams that prioritize quality, collaboration, and professional growth.

work.name: Freelance
work.summary: • Development of responsive web applications. • Collaboration with clients to understand their needs. • Continuous learning and improvement of skills in web development.

work.name: Continental Automotive Guadalajara
work.summary: • Proposal of improvements and corrections for the processes. • Analysis, measurement and monitoring of existing work methods. • Budget control, evaluation of equipment and resource costs. • Troubleshooting during the project introduction process.

work.name: Continental Automotive Guadalajara
work.summary: • Along with my activities as test support engineer, I took the leadership of the maintenance and support department. • Optimization of the maintenance budget, management of department materials and collaboration in the improvement plan.• Preparation of reports and briefings about the activities performed and administrative tasks. • Management of a technical team of 5 engineers and 14 technicians, planning of tasks and work shifts.

work.summary: • In charge of database development, as well as failure analysis and diagnosis of automotive electronics projects.

certificates.name: Autodidacta en Desarrollo Web
certificates.summary: Continuous learning through various online platforms such as Platzi, Udemy, and YouTube. Acquired skills in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Tailwind CSS, and GitHub.

certificates.name: Curso Práctico de Frontend Developer
certificates.summary: Development of web interfaces with HTML and CSS, applying semantic structure, styling, advanced layout and positioning techniques, and responsive design to produce clean and efficient code.

certificates.name: Curso de Pensamiento Lógico: Lenguajes de Programación
certificates.summary: Knowledge of variables, data types, control structures, functions, and object-oriented programming. Skilled in applying logical thinking to problem-solving and algorithm design.

certificates.name: Curso Profesional de Git y GitHub
certificates.summary: Skilled in repositories, commits, branches, and merges. Experience with version control, collaborative workflows using pull requests, and project management on GitHub.

certificates.name: i3070 User Fundamentals | 45 h

certificates.name: i3070 Maintenance Fundamentals | 45 h
certificates.summary: understanding of the Keysight 3070 service documentation, Confirmation, and Diagnostics, System-level card operation, power, analog, digital, and control subsystem operation, and troubleshooting.
